agis Rhee was a member of the Harpers and the High Harper of the Cloakwood Chapter in the Cloakwood on the Sword Coast in the late 15 century DR.
Before the Absolute crisis of the , Pagis Rhee was well acquainted with the High Harper of the nearby Baldurs Gate chapter, Jaheira, as well as her wards. When Jaheira, alongside a group of Harpers, took off to the dreaded Shadow-cursed Lands, aiming to stop the recently returned enemy General Ketheric Thorm, the entire group seemingly disappeared without a word. Rion, Jaheiras older high half-elven adoptive daughter, reached out to Pagis Rhee seeking an update or a comforting word. The High Harper of Cloakwood Chapter expressed utmost confidence in Jaheira and comforted Rion, saying her mother would be fine.
